basics.name: Tony Hawley
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary:
A multi disciplined full stack developer with over 10 years experience building websites, applications and content management solutions.

I specialise in Front-end HTML/CSS/JS, Back-end PHP/MySQL, WordPress & Laravel development.

I have worked with a vast array of clients including: British Airways, Microsoft, FIFA, Coca-Cola, UPS, London Stock Exchange, American Express, Panasonic, BlackBerry, Sony and International Olympic Committee.

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
